EmailTemplate.name: 2021 Dealer Update #7.2021 Dealer Update #7
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - March 2021
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | March 2021 New Sales Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins:
- 2021-05 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-05 Rev A - Mk II%2B FANS 1A PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> Mk II+ FANS 1A PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft - 2021-06 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-06 Rev A - Mk III to Mk II%2B PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> Mk III to Mk II+ PM-CPDLC Upgrade for Business Aircraft - 2021-07 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-07 Rev A - Mk III FANS 1 A Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> Rev A - Mk III FANS 1A Upgrade for Business Aircraft - 2021-21 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-21 Rev B - DU-1310 Display Replacement.pdf]]> DU-1310 Display Replacement - 2021-44 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-44 Rev B JetWave Promotions for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> JetWave Promotions for Business Aircraft - OIB 2021-44 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB 2021-44 Rev B JetWave Promotions for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>JetWave Promotions for Business Aircraft
Dealers can find these bulletins on our website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
